{R} If you control one or more Landmarks: You may discard target Permanent.
{R} []Target Character gains 2 boosts.  When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: You may discard target Permanent.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []You may have target Character other than me lose [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} If you control one or more Landmarks: You may return target Character or Permanent with Hand Cost {5} or less to its owner's hand.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play from your hand this turn activates its {r} abilities.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: []If you control one or more Landmarks: I cost {1} less.  {R} []Target Character in your other Expedition (the one I'm not in) gains 2 boosts.
{R} If you control one or more Landmarks: [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn loses [[Fleeting]].

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} If you control one or more Landmarks: Target Character gains 2 boosts.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next Character you play this turn gains 1 boost.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you control one or more Landmarks: Target Character gains 1 boost.
{H} If you control one or more Landmarks: Target Character in your other Expedition (the one I'm not in) gains 2 boosts.  {R} []Up to two target Characters each gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {D} : []The next card you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.
